pullRequest.title: Adds some miscellaneous, missing method documentation.
pullRequest.bodyText:
In order to add a Checkstyle for MissingJavadocMethod, we need to first
have Javadoc on our public and protected methods.
This commit begins chiseling away at that problem.
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

nodes.bodyText: All of this stuff was not used. And, it required more Javadocs. So, I just got rid of it, instead.

commit.message:
Require Javadoc on all public or protected methods

Adds the MissingJavadocMethod checkstyle configuration.

In order to repair the build, with this new configuration, many public
and protected methods have had Javadocs added, to "patch things up."

In a few places, there were some methods that did not need to be public
or protected, and have had their visibility lowered -- instead of
writing javadocs.

afterCommit.message:

In a few places, there were some methods that did not need to be public

nodes.bodyText: Yeah this is better down at the method level
